title: maa kulamuna
sahitya:
mA kulamuna-kihapara mosagina nIku mangaLam shubha mangaLam

anupallavi

 mA kula brOcina madana janaka nIku mangaLam shubha mangaLam

caraNam 1

 matagaja gamana mAnita sadguNa nIku mangaLam shubha mangaLam
   
caraNam 2

 mada mOha rahita manjuLa rUpa dhara nIku mangaLam shubha mangaLam
   
caraNam 3

 manasija vairi mAnasa sadana nIku mangaLam shubha mangaLam
   
caraNam 4

 manavini vini mammElu konna nIku mangaLam shubha mangaLam
   
caraNam 5

 manasuna nelakonna krSNa nIku mangaLam shubha mangaLam 
   
caraNam 6

 mA manOhara pAlita tyAgarAja mangaLam shubha mangaLam
